channel.title: Sribhashya of Sri Ramanuja taught by Vidvan Sri M.A. Alwar
channel.description:
A podcast created using https://github.com/vedavaapi/scala-akka-http-server from the archive item: https://archive.org/details/Sribhashya-of-Sri-Ramanuja-taught-by-M-A-Alwar, with description: श्रीभाष्यम् आळ्वारमहाशयेन पाठितम्।
mUlam - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLog-e7pBcwcmujBd-ysoRWvaMvNyyDSQJ.
